message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob! Fair and square!
I'll give you 40, but I'm keeping 60. It's a good deal for me!
I'll give you a bit more, Bob. Let's meet in the middle!
I'll give you 42, but I'm keeping 58. You're getting closer, but not close enough!
I'm getting desperate, Bob. This is my best offer. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you 38, but I'm keeping 62. You're getting closer, but I'm not going to give up!
I'm going back to the original split. It's now or never, Bob!
